heading: Helpful Information
intestacyDocumentsParagraph1:
To avoid any delays in processing your application, you must send us:
  • [document list]
  • either a completed application coversheet (20KB PDF) or write your reference number {referenceNumber} on a sheet of paper
documentsParagraph1:
To avoid any delays in reviewing your application, you must send us:

  • the original will
  • any page or document that you’ve removed from the will
  • either a completed application coversheet (20KB PDF) or write your reference number {referenceNumber} on a sheet of paper
documentsParagraph2:
You should make a copy of the documents for your records.

Send the documents, preferably by ‘tracked with signature’, to:

HMCTS Probate
PO Box 12625
Harlow
CM20 9QE

We’ll email you when we've received your documents.There might be a delay of up to 2 weeks from us receiving your documents and sending the email.
documentsParagraph3: We’ll keep the original will as it becomes a public document by law.
helpParagraph:
If the will was made with a solicitor it may be held at their office. If the firm of solicitors that drew up the will are no longer in existence you’ll need to contact the Solicitors Regulation Authority (opens in a new tab) to search their records as they may now hold the original will.

Find the original will (opens in a new window).
